Introduction

MVP (Korean: 엠브이피; Japanese: エンブイピー) is a seven-member boy group under PH Entertainment. They debuted on March 13, 2017 with the release of their first mini-album Manifest. Their name stands for "Most Valuable Player".

On February 16, 2022, member Rayoon revealed that the group had disbanded.
